Artifact Exists Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2017-01-27  | Version: 0.0.2-SNAPSHOT
Artifact Exists Maven Plugin
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

exists:local

Full name:

org.honton.chas:exists-maven-plugin:0.0.2-SNAPSHOT:local

Description:

Set a property if the artifact in the local repository is same as the just built artifact.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Since version: 0.0.2.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: verify.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
artifact String 0.0.2 The artifact of the project to compare. Defaults to the project's principal artifact.
Default value is: ${project.build.finalName}.${project.packaging}.
project String 0.0.2 The project Group:Artifact:Version to compare. Defaults to the current project's GAV.
Default value is: ${project.groupId}:${project.artifactId}:${project.version}.
property String 0.0.2 The property to set if the artifact exists in the deploy repository. The default property of maven.deploy.skip may cause the deploy plugin to skip execution.
Default value is: maven.install.skip.
skipIfSnapshot boolean 0.0.2 If checksums are not used, should this plugin skip checking SNAPSHOT versions?
Default value is: true.
useChecksum boolean 0.0.2 Set whether checksum is used to compare artifacts, The default is the install plugin's configuration to create checksums.
Default value is: ${createChecksum}.

Parameter Details

artifact:

The artifact of the project to compare. Defaults to the project's principal artifact.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 0.0.2
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${project.build.finalName}.${project.packaging}

project:

The project Group:Artifact:Version to compare. Defaults to the current project's GAV.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 0.0.2
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${project.groupId}:${project.artifactId}:${project.version}

property:

The property to set if the artifact exists in the deploy repository. The default property of maven.deploy.skip may cause the deploy plugin to skip execution.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 0.0.2
  • Required: No
  • Default: maven.install.skip

skipIfSnapshot:

If checksums are not used, should this plugin skip checking SNAPSHOT versions?
  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 0.0.2
  • Required: No
  • Default: true

useChecksum:

Set whether checksum is used to compare artifacts, The default is the install plugin's configuration to create checksums.
  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 0.0.2
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${createChecksum}
